overview: Shot overs 3 years, with a small crew of 5 people, "Hier, Aujourd'hui, Hier" ("Yesterday, Today, Yesterday") is the first feature film from Xavier Beauchesne-Rondeau and is a completely independent effort that explores, with sincerity, the ups and downs of love stories. The ones that leave scars. The ones that force you to rethink your life.
title: Yesterday, Today, Yesterday
